taDuoc: lactose, Cellulose vi tinh thể, natri lauryl sulphat, tinh bột natri glycolat, croscarmellose natri, silic dioxid keo (Aerosil 200), magnesi stearat, HPMC 15 cps, HPMC5 cps, polyethylen glycol 6000, titan dioxid, talc tinh chế, oxid sắt đỏ, polysorbat 80 (Tween 80), methanol*, methylen clorid*
